lead_intro: Imagine traveling to a beach on the other side of the globe in an instant without spending a penny. Let's explore the futuristic concept of teleportation!

quiz.question: What does the powerful scanner do to your body?
choices: disintegrate your body into tiny atoms
magnify the particles in your body
send you to the other side of the globe
quiz.answer: disintegrate your body into tiny atoms
quiz.explanation: The scanner breaks down your body into tiny atoms for teleportation.

quiz.question: How long would it take to transmit your blueprint with current satellite bandwidth?
quiz.explanation: With current satellite bandwidth, it would take 80,000 years to transmit your blueprint for teleportation.

quiz.question: What may happen to your consciousness according to the terms and conditions?
quiz.explanation: According to the terms and conditions, you may suffer Consciousness interruption or deletion during the teleportation process.

quiz.question: How large is the data package representing your blueprint?
choices: more than 150 million times larger than the yearly Digital Data output of all of humanity
1/10 the size of the yearly Digital Data output of all of humanity
exactly the same size as the yearly Digital Data output of all of humanity
quiz.answer: more than 150 million times larger than the yearly Digital Data output of all of humanity
quiz.explanation: The data package representing your blueprint is more than 150 million times larger than the yearly Digital Data output of all of humanity.

quiz.question: What is the role of the receiver device in the teleportation process?
choices: a big 3D printer to recreate your new body
quiz.answer: a big 3D printer to recreate your new body
quiz.explanation: The receiver device acts as a big 3D printer that takes your blueprint and recreates your new body for the teleportation process.
